april.vis
Interface VisLayerManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLayerManager
public interface VisLayerManager

Method Summary
 int[] getLayerPosition(VisCanvas vc, int[] viewport, VisLayer vl, long mtime)
          Returns a viewport with v[0],v[1] representing the bottom left coordinate of the view port (opengl style coordinates with y=0 at the bottom).
 

Method Detail

getLayerPosition

int[] getLayerPosition(VisCanvas vc,
                       int[] viewport,
                       VisLayer vl,
                       long mtime)
Returns a viewport with v[0],v[1] representing the bottom left coordinate of the view port (opengl style coordinates with y=0 at the bottom). v[2] and v[3] are the width and height ofthe viewport.
